Name: Susej B
Title: Not a tourist attraction.
Review: The first astro-turf pitch for hockey in Lucknow was laid here and located at The Lucknow Sports College !

Name: Sundeepgupta
Title: Grand.
Review: This place is always full of player and sport persons. Visit this place if you love to sports, health and fitness.

Name: Arpit141
Title: Nice Visit
Review: Dhyan Chand Astroturf Stadium or Dhayan Chand Sports College is a field hockey stadium in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India named after Indian hockey player Dhyan Chand. It serves as the home ground for Hockey India League franchise, Uttar Pradesh Wizards.

Name: SKBhatiya
Title: Good Place to see Once
Review: A good stadium built a little far from the city but the astroturf is of high quality, i remember there were some international hockey matches played here a few years ago...

Name: abhineetsingh
Title: Dhyan Chand Astroturf Stadium
Review: Dhyan Chand Astroturf Stadium os next to Dhayan Chand Sports College on kursi road lucknow is a field hockey stadium in Lucknow I named after  hockey player Dhyan Chand. Its also home ground for Hockey India League franchise, Uttar Pradesh Wizard
